meanings.sent1: The sonantal waves filled the room with a gentle hum.
meanings.sent2: The sonantal quality of the music was soothing to the ears.
meanings.sent3: The sonantal chatter of the birds outside made the morning more cheerful.
meanings.sent4: His sonantal laughter echoed through the halls like a melody.
meanings.sent5: The sonantal raindrops on the roof created a peaceful rhythm.

meanings.sent1: The sonantal nature of the wind in the trees was calming.
meanings.sent2: Her voice had a sonantal tone that was pleasant to listen to.
meanings.sent3: The sonantal purring of the cat put everyone in a relaxed mood.
meanings.sent4: The sonantal bells in the distance signaled the start of the festival.
meanings.sent5: The sonantal melody of the flute floated through the air gracefully.

meanings.definition: Consisting of or characterized by sounds
meanings.sent1: The sonantal environment of the forest was alive with chirping birds.
meanings.sent2: The sonantal atmosphere of the concert hall was filled with music.
meanings.sent3: The sonantal buzz of the bees added to the peacefulness of the garden.
meanings.sent4: The sonantal rhythm of the drums energized the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The sonantal symphony of nature could be heard in the distance.
